title: How do I exit the setup loop saying that "this device isn't active"?
content: Setting up new device with Google Fi. Copied over personal Gmail and work Gmail account. Now getting stuck in a loop because of an error. The error states "this device isn't active. Your device must be approved by admin." This prevents the phone from being used at all or completing setup. There is no way to remove the work email during setup. Does this warrant a factory reset and not include the work email account with new setup process? How do I complete a factory reset?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
